description: The Cobra iRadar 230 community-based detection system is a high-performance detector that detects all radar and laser guns currently in use. The iRAD 230 works with iPhone and Android smartphones, provides 360 degree protection, and reduces false alerts with city/highway mode. Cobra"s iRadar app displays visual alerts from the detector on iPhone or Android smartphones. It alerts to speed and red light cameras, known speed traps and dangerous intersections. The iRAD 230 shares alerts and locations in real-time with the Cobra iRadar Community.
title: Cobra Electronics iRAD 230 Community-Based Detection System
